verbs.description: at [V: revamped] [ARG1: government center station] echoes of a burlesque past when sailors dropped anchor in boston during world war ii officers told them they had earned their liberty time but they were cautioned to avoid scollay square and its burlesque shows so of course what the first place that all those young testosterone - filled young men would go except scollay square ’’ said david kruh who has … david kruh city hall plaza manchester government center t station charlie glass encased government center station citys government center district boston scollay government center station scollay square
